Text.Page: Indeed, the Mysterium is very much a part of Allemantheia. Though membership has broadened recently, the high elves are the single largest contingent and our ways shape its path.
What are you doing in here?
Princess! Alais warned that you might be coming.
Of course, princess. Here you are. Most curious!
Only that both you and this famous hero are bound for Veritas today.
Soldier, will you go with her? A princess should have escorts.
Curious indeed! I suspect your day will be interesting, hero!
Oh, dear. It seems the princess dropped something!
I'm grateful for your help, but I'm not sure I agree on your thoughts about the argons.
